user_query: I need to plan a trip to the Efteling theme park with my family. Can you retrieve the latest blogs about the park and provide me with the queue times for the attractions? Also, generate five payment card numbers with the scheme 'visa' to book the tickets.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest blogs about the Efteling theme park.
Get the current queue times for the attractions at Efteling theme park.
Generate five payment card numbers with the scheme 'visa' for booking tickets.
